TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionsZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone

summary.span: 提供用户界面 (UI)，使用户能够在 和驻留在 区域的其他服务器控件之间建立连接。

span.span: Provides a user interface (UI) that enables users to form connections between and other server controls that reside in zones.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 Web 部件控件集，可以使两个服务器控件形成连接和共享数据，其中一个控件作为提供程序和另一个充当数据的使用者。Using the Web Parts control set, you can enable two server controls to form a connection and share data, with one control acting as the provider, and the other acting as the consumer of the data. 这两个控件可以是控件或任何其他类型的服务器控件，提供它们旨在处理的连接，并且它们驻留在区域。The two controls can be controls or any other type of server control, provided that they are designed to handle connections, and that they are residing in a zone. 若要了解有关 Web 部件连接的详细信息，请参阅并类概述，以及[Web 部件连接概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178187(v=vs.100))。To learn more about Web Parts connections, see the and class overviews, as well as [Web Parts Connections Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178187(v=vs.100)). 前提是必需的控件和条件存在以形成 Web 部件连接中，则仍然需要实际连接控件。Provided that the requisite controls and conditions exist to form a Web Parts connection, it is still necessary to actually connect the controls. 有三种方法，以形成服务器控件之间的连接： 声明在网页中的连接、 在代码中，创建连接或添加控件到页，以便用户可以连接按需的控件。There are three ways to form a connection between server controls: declaring a connection in a Web page, creating a connection in code, or adding a control to the page so that users can connect the controls on demand. 控件生成一个 UI，使用户能够连接或断开连接页面上任何满足形成连接所需的条件的服务器控件。The control generates a UI that enables users to connect or disconnect any server controls on a page that meet the conditions necessary to form a connection. 它是一个可选控件不是窗体连接所必需的但在你想要为用户提供的控制服务器控件对其连接或断开连接的情况下很有用。It is an optional control that is not necessary to form connections, but is useful in the case where you want to give users control over which server controls are connected or disconnected. 控件是一个 Web 部件工具区域控件继承自基类。The control is one of the Web Parts tool zone controls that inherit from the base class. 作为工具区域，控件设计为仅当其 Web 页处于某种显示模式时才可见。As a tool zone, the control is designed to be visible only when its Web page is in a certain display mode. 在这种情况下，名为的显示模式连接模式 (在页处于此模式下时页上的控件具有其属性值设置为)。In this case, the display mode is named connect mode (a page is in this mode when the control on the page has its property value set to ). 用户切换到连接模式下的页面后，他们必须单击其中一个服务器控件的谓词菜单上的连接谓词，然后连接用户界面变为可见。After users switch a page into connect mode, they must click a connect verb on the verbs menu of one of the server controls, and then the connection UI becomes visible. 为 Web 部件区域控件控件是一种区域 (它是从类) 设计为包含其他控件。As a Web Parts zone control, the control is a type of zone (which inherits from the class) designed to contain other controls. 一般情况下，区域与其他 Web 部件工具区域具有相同的元素的大多数： 标头、 正文或内容区域中和一个页脚。In general, a zone has most of the same elements as other Web Parts tool zones: a header, a body or contents area, and a footer. Web 部件区域以及区域的不同部分的完整讨论，请参阅类概述。For a complete discussion of what a Web Parts zone is, and the different parts of a zone, see the class overview. > [!IMPORTANT] > 与大多数其他 Web 部件区域，务必要注意区域不包含服务器控件与之关联的唯一类型。Unlike most other Web Parts zones, it is important to note that a zone does not contain a unique type of server control associated with it. 有关区域和它们所包含的关联的控件的列表，请参阅中的图表类概述。For a list of zones and the associated controls they contain, see the chart in the class overview. 但区域不包含控件。But the zone does not contain controls. 相反，它的用途非常有限的提供的用户连接或断开连接存在某些中的服务器控件的 UI页面上的区域。Instead, it serves a very limited purpose of providing a UI for users to connect or disconnect server controls that exist in some zone on the page. 中包含的唯一控件控制是在标准的 ASP.NET 服务器控件，它将生成用于形成连接的用户界面的一部分。The only controls contained in a control are the standard ASP.NET server controls that it generates as part of its UI for forming connections. 当呈现控件时，将生成基于都能建立连接的服务器控件的页上的 UI。When the control is rendered, it generates a UI based on the server controls on the page that are capable of forming connections. 控件将确定哪一台服务器中的控件页将提供程序，使用者，哪个连接点是否可用，以及服务器控件是否是当前连接或断开连接，然后再将它的区域相应地生成 UI。The control determines which server controls in the zone on the page are providers, which are consumers, which connection points are available, and whether the server controls are currently connected or disconnected, and then it generates the UI accordingly. 例如，假设有一个控件作为提供者，支持一个控件作为使用者能够，声明它们中的页上，和当前已断开连接。For example, suppose there is one control capable of being a provider, one control capable of being a consumer, they are declared in a on the page, and they are currently disconnected. 当用户切换到连接模式的页面并单击其中一个控件，连接谓词控件生成一个用户界面，单击时，显示的窗体中哪些用户可以选择的选项创建的连接的链接。When a user switches the page to connect mode and clicks the connect verb on one of the controls, the control generates a UI with a link that, when clicked, displays a form in which users can choose options to create a connection. （如果以前未连接控件，初始视图改为向用户显示一个按钮用于断开的控件）。(If the controls were previously connected, the initial view instead presents users with a button to disconnect the controls). 在用于创建新连接的连接用户界面，用户会显示哪个控件是一个提供程序，以及哪个控件是一个使用者。In the connection UI for creating new connections, users are shown which control is a provider, and which control is a consumer. 列出可用每个服务器控件的下方将出现一个下拉列表控件控件对象。A drop-down list control appears below each server control, listing the available objects for the control. 从相应的下拉列表中，用户必须选择一个对象提供程序 （若要确定哪些接口和数据都将与使用者共享），且一个每个使用者的对象 (用于确定哪些接口和数据将使用使用者） 将连接到提供程序。From the respective drop-down lists, users must select one object for the provider (to determine what interface and data will be shared with consumers), and one object for each consumer (to determine what interface and data the consumer will consume) that will be connected to the provider. > [!NOTE] > 在 Web 部件控件集默认实现，一个提供程序可以连接到多个使用者，但使用者可以只有一个访问接口。In the Web Parts control set default implementation, one provider can connect to many consumers, but a consumer can have only one provider. 若要使用控件，您可将其声明内`
`在 Web 上的元素 （但不是能嵌套在另一个 Web 部件区域元素） 页上，使用``元素，或者可以将其添加到页面以编程方式。To use the control, you can declare it within the `` element on a Web page (but not nested within another Web Parts zone element), using the `` element, or you can add it to the page programmatically. 如果声明的页上，这与其他 Web 部件区域，不同的元素不能声明任何其他类型的服务器控件的标记之间``元素。If you declare the element in a page, unlike the other Web Parts zones, you cannot declare any other type of server controls between the tags of the `` element. 您可以声明中它的元素与自己的属性和样式的详细信息，但它是一个独立的元素并不是控件可以声明的其他服务器中的模板控件。You can declare elements within it that relate to its own properties and style details, but it is a standalone element and is not a template control within which other server controls can be declared. > [!NOTE] > 若要提高可访问性，控件中呈现`
`元素。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. `
`元素进行分组的控件用于在中建立连接的相关的集合控件使用，而且便于在这些控件之间的这两个可视用户代理 （如普通的 Web 浏览器） 的选项卡式的导航和面向语音的用户代理 （如屏幕读取软件）。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for establishing connections in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). 控件具有多个属性使用来呈现连接用户界面。The control has a number of properties it uses for rendering the connection UI. 一组属性包括多个谓词-仅与连接的用户界面中执行操作： ， ，和。One set of properties includes several verbs--used only in relation to connections--that carry out actions in the UI: , , and . 属性，尤其是用于连接区域 UI 中，一大组包含用户界面中显示在多个位置 （或在某些情况下，例如中发生错误时） 的文本字符串： ， ， ， ， , , , , , , , , , , , , , ， ，和。A large set of properties, used especially for the connections zone UI, consists of text strings displayed at various places (or in certain situations, such as when errors occur) in the UI: , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , and . 类还包含多个其他 Web 部件区域中的常见属性： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The class also contains a number of common properties found in other Web Parts zones: , , , , , , and . 最后，属性是唯一的引用启动的连接的控件的类 (这是的控件的用户单击菜单中，这也是该控件中引用其谓词中的 connect 谓词控件的属性)。Finally, the property is unique to the class, referencing the control that initiates the connection (this is the control on which the user clicks the connect verb in its verbs menu, which is also the control referenced in the control's property). 类还具有多种方法，所有这些都继承和重写从基类，并且其中大部分来自于 Web 部件区域基类。The class also has a number of methods, all of which are inherited and overridden from base classes, and most of them come from the base Web Parts zone classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅单个方法。For details, see the individual methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用Web 部件页上的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control on a Web Parts page. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于在网页上切换显示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. - 包含的代码的邮政编码接口和两个源文件控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载所有控件的网页演示如何声明``元素，并设置多个属性在连接区域以声明方式和以编程方式。A Web page that hosts all the controls, demonstrates how to declare an `` element, and sets a number of properties on the connections zone declaratively and programmatically. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够在网页上切换显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to switch display modes on a Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练：更改显示模式同时适用于 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 该示例的第二部分是使用接口和自定义控件的源文件。The second part of the example is the source file with the interface and custom controls. 请注意，`ZipCodeWebPart`控件实现`IZipCode`接口，添加`ConnectionProvider`属性，以便该控件可以作为提供程序的连接。Notice that the `ZipCodeWebPart` control implements the `IZipCode` interface, adding a `ConnectionProvider` attribute so that the control can act as a provider for a connection. `WeatherWebPart`控件具有标记的方法`ConnectionConsumer`属性，其中使用`IZipCode`接口，所以它可以用作连接中的使用者。The `WeatherWebPart` control has a method marked with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute, where it consumes the `IZipCode` interface, so it can act as a consumer in a connection. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此示例使用动态编译。This example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 示例代码的第三个部分是 Web 页。The third part of the example code is the Web page. 顶部附近是`Register`为用户控件和自定义控件在连接中使用的指令。Near the top are `Register` directives for the user control and the custom controls used in the connection. ``元素声明中使用的示例与页面以声明方式控制。An `` element is declared in the page as an example of using the control declaratively. 在元素中，以声明方式设置的属性数。Within the element, a number of properties are set declaratively. 中的连接区域上的其他属性以编程方式设置`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此默认构造函数调用在声明时``ASP.NET 页面中的元素。This default constructor is called when you declare the `` element in an ASP.NET page. 不需要隐式调用此构造函数，除非在其中你会将控件添加到页面以编程方式的情况下。You do not need to implicitly call this constructor, except in cases where you are adding the control to the page programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将构造函数创建的新实例控件以编程方式添加到 Web 页。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor to create a new instance of a control to add to a Web page programmatically. 该示例包含仅演示了使用的构造函数; Web 页的代码其他两个代码运行该示例，请参阅示例部分的所需文件类概述。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the constructor; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于在网页上切换显示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 获取此代码从类概述。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含的代码的邮政编码接口和两个源文件控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 获取此代码从类概述。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载的所有控件的网页，然后在其`Page_Init`方法，将使用构造函数创建的新实例控制并将其添加到页面。A Web page that hosts all the controls and, in its `Page_Init` method, uses the constructor to create a new instance of the control and add it to the page. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 在 Web 页上，在`Page_Init`方法时，新（使用构造函数） 创建控件并将其添加到页面。On the Web page, in the `Page_Init` method, a new control is created (using the constructor) and added to the page. 当用户将页设置为连接模式，并单击其中一个上的连接谓词控件，显示控件。When a user sets the page to connect mode and clicks the connect verb on one of the controls, a control appears. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_ctor/CS/connectionZoneCtorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_ctor/VB/connectionZoneCtorVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器页面加载。Load the page in a browser. 切换到连接模式，使用**显示模式**控件。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击谓词菜单箭头**ZIP 代码提供程序**控件，并单击连接谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 连接用户界面出现，且已连接控件，因为连接已在页的标记中声明。The connection UI appears, and the controls are already connected because the connection was declared in the markup of the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消动词，如用于控件，是显示在连接用户界面 (UI) 中为视图的一部分中哪些用户选择的控件的连接点的区域级别动词。The cancel verb, as used with a control, is a zone-level verb that appears in the connection user interface (UI) as part of the view in which users select connection points for the controls. 当用户单击取消谓词时，它将取消选择连接点的过程并连接区域视图返回到用户可以单击来建立新连接的超链接。When users click the cancel verb, it cancels the process of selecting connection points, and returns the connections zone view to the hyperlinks that users can click to establish a new connection. 使用属性来获取对相应的引用在 UI 中的对象。Use the property to get a reference to the corresponding object in the UI. 尽管属性本身是只读的具有对该谓词的引用后，可以根据需要更改其属性值。Although the property itself is read-only, after you have a reference to the verb, you can change its property values as needed. 您可以通过声明以声明方式设置取消谓词的属性值``元素的标记中``元素。You can set the property values of the cancel verb declaratively, by declaring the `` element within the tags of an `` element. 可以在窗体中以声明方式设置该谓词的属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是属性的对象 (例如， `CancelVerb-Text`)。The properties of the verb can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `CancelVerb-Text`). 您还可以设置属性以编程方式在窗体`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelVerb.Text`)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelVerb.Text`). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将具有属性控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 该示例包含仅说明如何使用属性; Web 页的代码其他两个代码运行该示例，请参阅示例部分的所需文件类概述。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于在网页上切换显示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 获取此代码从类概述。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含的代码的邮政编码接口和两个源文件控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 获取此代码从类概述。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件的网页声明``元素，并演示如何以声明方式和以编程方式使用的属性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. Web 页面声明``元素，并在元素中，它声明``元素，并设置一些属性使用属性。The Web page declares an `` element, and within the element, it declares a `` element and sets some properties using attributes. 此外，在`Page_PreRender`方法，该代码设置某些属性上的取消谓词控件。Also, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code sets some properties on the cancel verb for the control. summary.span: 关闭由 控件创建的连接用户界面 (UI)。

span.span: Closes the connection user interface (UI) created by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在用户单击连接用户界面中的区域级别关闭谓词时调用方法。The method is called when a user clicks the zone-level close verb in the connection UI. 执行方法时，UI 隐藏的该连接后属性值是`null`，并且页面仍保留在连接显示模式。After the method executes, the connection UI is hidden, the property value is `null`, and the page remains in the connect display mode. 现在用户可以通过单击连接谓词在控件的谓词菜单中，选择一个控件或将页面切换到另一种显示模式。At this point users can either select a control by clicking the connect verb on the control's verbs menu, or switch the page to another display mode.

summary.span: 获取一个对 对象的引用，最终用户可使用该对象关闭由 控件创建的连接用户界面 (UI)。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that enables end users to close the connection user interface (UI) created by the control.

value.span: 一个 ，使最终用户可以关闭连接用户界面。

span.span: A that allows an end user to close the connection UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭谓词，用于为控件，是显示在底部 （页脚） 的连接用户界面的区域级别动词。The close verb, as used with a control, is a zone-level verb that appears at the bottom (the footer) of the connection UI. 当用户单击关闭谓词时，它取消连接过程并关闭连接用户界面，但是叶中的页连接显示模式。When users click the close verb, it cancels the connection process and closes the connection UI, but leaves the page in connect display mode. 此时，用户可以返回页后，可以浏览模式，或单击要重新打开连接用户界面的另一个服务器控件的连接谓词。At this point, the user can either return the page to browse mode or click the connect verb on another server control to reopen the connection UI. 关闭谓词应区分从标头关闭谓词 (有关详细信息，请参阅属性)。The close verb should be distinguished from the header close verb (for details, see the property). 这两个谓词都执行相同操作的关闭连接用户界面，但标头关闭谓词显示在 UI 的顶部，由表示超链接默认情况下，而关闭谓词 UI，底部将显示，并且默认情况下由一个按钮。Both verbs perform the identical action of closing the connection UI, but the header close verb appears at the top of the UI and is represented by a hyperlink by default, whereas the close verb appears at the bottom of the UI, and is represented by a button by default. 使用属性来获取对相应的引用在 UI 中的对象。Use the property to get a reference to the corresponding object in the UI. 尽管属性本身是只读的具有对该谓词的引用后，可以根据需要更改其属性值。Although the property itself is read-only, after you have a reference to the verb, you can change its property values as needed. 您可以通过声明以声明方式设置关闭谓词的属性值``元素的标记中``元素。You can set the property values of the close verb declaratively, by declaring the `` element within the tags of an `` element. 可以在窗体中以声明方式设置该谓词的属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是属性的对象 (例如， `CloseVerb-Text`)。The properties of the verb can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `CloseVerb-Text`). 您还可以设置属性以编程方式在窗体`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CloseVerb.Text`)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CloseVerb.Text`). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将具有属性控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 该示例包含仅说明如何使用属性; Web 页的代码其他两个代码运行该示例，请参阅示例部分的所需文件类概述。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于在网页上切换显示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 获取此代码从类概述。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含的代码的邮政编码接口和两个源文件控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 获取此代码从类概述。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件的网页声明``元素，并演示如何以声明方式和以编程方式使用的属性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. Web 页面声明``元素，并在元素中，它声明``元素和属性使用属性的集。The Web page declares an `` element, and within the element, it declares a `` element and sets a property using attributes. 此外，在`Page_PreRender`方法，该代码设置属性上的关闭谓词控件。Also, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code sets a property on the close verb for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器页面加载。Load the page in a browser. 切换到连接模式，使用**显示模式**控件。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击谓词菜单箭头**ZIP 代码提供程序**控件，并单击连接谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 单击**结束连接**按钮以断开连接已连接以声明性连接页上的控件。Click the **End Connection** button to disconnect the controls that are already connected due to the declarative connection on the page. 单击**选择要使用连接的提供程序的使用者**超链接，并注意设置各种属性的影响。Click the **Select a consumer for the provider to connect with** hyperlink, and notice the effect of setting the various properties. 如果将鼠标指针放**关闭区域**按钮底部的连接用户界面，将自定义说明文本显示在工具提示。If you position your mouse pointer over the **Close Zone** button at the bottom of the connection UI, the custom description text appears in a ToolTip. 请注意，在连接区域顶部的标头关闭谓词由一个超链接，并关闭谓词的属性赋值对标头关闭谓词无效。Notice that the header close verb at the top of the connections zone is represented by a hyperlink, and your property assignments on the close verb have no effect on the header close verb.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性，以使用本部分连接用户界面的标题的自定义值。Use the property to use a custom value for the title of this section of the connection UI. 当用户已显示连接用户界面包含现有连接，并单击配置谓词时，会出现在 UI 的配置连接部分 (默认情况下，这由**配置**连接用户界面中的按钮)。The Configure Connections section of the UI appears when a user has displayed the connection UI with an existing connection, and clicks the configure verb (by default, this is represented by a **Configure** button in the connection UI). 您可以通过将分配到的字符串以声明方式，设置属性值`configureconnectiontitle`特性，可以在``标记在网页中的。You can set the property value declaratively, by assigning a string to the `configureconnectiontitle` attribute on the `` tag in a Web page. 或者，可以以编程方式分配给属性的字符串。Or you can assign a string to the property programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将具有属性控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 该示例包含仅说明如何使用属性; Web 页的代码其他两个代码运行该示例，请参阅示例部分的所需文件类概述。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于在网页上切换显示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 获取此代码从类概述。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含的代码的邮政编码接口和两个源文件控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 获取此代码从类概述。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件的网页声明``元素，并演示如何以编程方式使用该属性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. Web 页面声明``元素，然后在`Page_PreRender`方法，该代码将一个值赋给属性。The Web page declares an `` element, and in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器页面加载。Load the page in a browser. 切换到连接模式，使用**显示模式**控件。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击谓词菜单箭头**ZIP 代码提供程序**控件，并单击连接谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 因为连接已存在，您现在看到**结束连接**按钮，和一个**配置**按钮，表示配置谓词。Because the connection already exists, you now see an **End Connection** button, and a **Configure** button, which represents the configure verb. 如果你的连接是可配置 （它不是在此代码示例），**配置**按钮将处于启用状态; 你可以单击它以打开配置连接部分中，而标题可能为值分配给的代码属性。If your connection were configurable (it is not in this code example), the **Configure** button would be enabled; you could click it to open the Configure Connections section, and the title would be the value the code assigned to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在特定的连接方案中才会生效。The property takes effect in a specific connection scenario. 当用户单击的提供者控件中，连接谓词控件显示的部分连接用户界面，使用户能够选择使用者。When a user clicks the connect verb on a provider control, the control displays a portion of the connection UI that enables users to select a consumer. 如果用户单击上使用者的连接谓词，然后连接用户界面将执行与之相反，并显示有关连接到提供程序的信息。If the user clicked a connect verb on the consumer, then the connection UI would do the reverse, and display information about connecting to a provider. 中的文本正上方的下拉列表控件包含一个提供程序可以连接到可用的使用者连接点的显示属性。The text in the property is displayed just above the drop-down list controls that contain the available consumer connection points to which a provider can be connected. 您可以通过使用以声明方式设置此属性`ConnectToConsumerInstructionText`属性中的开始标记``元素页上，或者您可以以编程方式设置的属性。You can set this property declaratively, by using the `ConnectToConsumerInstructionText` attribute in the opening tag of the `` element in a page, or you can set the property programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将具有属性控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 该示例包含仅说明如何使用属性; Web 页的代码其他两个代码运行该示例，请参阅示例部分的所需文件类概述。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于在网页上切换显示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 获取此代码从类概述。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含的代码的邮政编码接口和两个源文件控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 获取此代码从类概述。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件的网页声明``元素，并演示如何以编程方式使用该属性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. Web 页面声明``元素，然后在`Page_PreRender`方法，该代码将一个值赋给属性。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器页面加载。Load the page in a browser. 切换到连接模式，使用**显示模式**控件。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击谓词菜单箭头**ZIP 代码提供程序**控件，并单击连接谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 单击**结束连接**按钮以结束连接，然后单击**选择要使用连接的提供程序的使用者**超链接。Click the **End Connection** button to end the connection, and then click the **Select a consumer for the provider to connect with** hyperlink. 使用者连接的 UI 显示方式，并自定义文本分配给属性将显示与该控件，您可以选择在使用者连接点用于与提供程序进行连接的区域上方。The consumer connection UI appears, and the custom text assigned to the property appears just above the area with the control that allows you to select a connection point on the consumer for connecting with the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接谓词，如用于控件，是显示在连接用户界面 (UI) 中为视图的一部分中哪些用户完成两个控件之间的连接的区域级别动词。The connect verb, as used with a control, is a zone-level verb that appears in the connection user interface (UI) as part of the view in which users finalize a connection between two controls. 在用户可以在其中选择连接点的用户界面的部分是否能够连接两个控件，该用户界面底部附近启用连接谓词。In the part of the UI where users can select connection points, if two controls are able to connect, the connect verb is enabled near the bottom of the UI. 用户选择的连接点后，他们可以单击连接谓词以创建连接。After users select a connection point, they can click the connect verb to create the connection. > [!NOTE] > 区域级别的连接本主题中讨论的谓词实际上控件之间建立连接，并且与不同的谓词菜单显示的谓词控件。The zone-level connect verb discussed in this topic actually establishes a connection between controls, and is different from the verb that appears on the verbs menu of a control. 当用户切换网页连接显示模式下，如果控件可以形成连接，连接谓词出现在其谓词菜单。When a user switches a Web page to connect display mode, if a control can form connections, a connect verb appears on its verbs menu. 这连接谓词只是打开连接用户界面创建控件。This connect verb simply opens the connection UI created by the control. 与此相反，在区域级别进行操作，本主题中所述的谓词实际上会创建一个连接。In contrast, the verb discussed in this topic, which operates at the zone level, actually creates a connection. 使用属性来获取对相应的引用在 UI 中的对象。Use the property to get a reference to the corresponding object in the UI. 尽管属性本身是只读的具有对该谓词的引用后，可以根据需要更改其属性值。Although the property itself is read-only, after you have a reference to the verb, you can change its property values as needed. 您可以通过声明以声明方式设置连接谓词的属性值``元素的开始和结束标记之间``元素。You can set the property values of the connect verb declaratively, by declaring the `` element between the opening and closing tags of an `` element. 该谓词的属性也可以设置以声明方式的开始标记内``元素中的，通过在窗体中添加属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`的属性对象 (例如， `ConnectVerb-Text`)。The properties of the verb can also be set declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `ConnectVerb-Text`). 您还可以设置属性以编程方式在窗体`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `ConnectVerb.Text`)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ConnectVerb.Text`). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将具有属性控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 该示例包含仅说明如何使用属性; Web 页的代码其他两个代码运行该示例，请参阅示例部分的所需文件类概述。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于在网页上切换显示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 获取此代码从类概述。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含的代码的邮政编码接口和两个源文件控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 获取此代码从类概述。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件的网页声明``元素，并演示如何以声明方式和以编程方式使用的属性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. Web 页面声明``元素和在该元素标记，它声明``元素，并设置一些属性使用属性。The Web page declares an `` element and, within the element tags, it declares a `` element and sets some properties using attributes. 此外，在`Page_PreRender`方法，代码可设置某些属性的 connect 谓词控件。Also, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code sets some properties on the connect verb for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器页面加载。Load the page in a browser. 切换到连接模式，使用**显示模式**控件。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击谓词菜单箭头**ZIP 代码提供程序**控件，并单击连接谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 单击**结束连接**按钮以断开连接已连接以声明性连接页上的控件。Click the **End Connection** button to disconnect the controls that are already connected due to the declarative connection on the page. 单击**选择要使用连接的提供程序的使用者**超链接，并注意设置各种属性的影响。Click the **Select a consumer for the provider to connect with** hyperlink, and notice the effect of setting the various properties. 如果将鼠标指针放**连接控件**按钮，将自定义说明文本显示在工具提示。If you position your mouse pointer over the **Connect Controls** button, the custom description text appears in a ToolTip.

Web 页面声明``元素，然后在`Page_PreRender`方法，该代码将一个值赋给属性。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器页面加载。Load the page in a browser. 切换到连接模式，使用**显示模式**控件。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击谓词菜单箭头**ZIP 代码提供程序**控件，并单击连接谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 在打开的现有连接的视图，在分配给的自定义文本的使用者部分中查找属性。In the view that opens for the existing connection, look in the consumers section for the custom text assigned to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写基方法。This method overrides the base method. 准备与连接相关的所有对象所需的连接 （例如，它检索的连接点对象从可用的使用者和提供程序控件），并创建以与用户交互的各种用户界面 (UI) 控件连接用户界面来建立的连接。It prepares all connection-related objects needed for connections (for example, it retrieves the connection point objects from the available consumer and provider controls), and it creates the various user interface (UI) controls that users interact with in the connection UI to establish a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中包含的文本属性是否可见时显示用户界面连接和连接已存在。The text contained in the property is visible whenever the connection UI is displayed and a connection already exists. 正下方的标头文本是说明标题文本 (包含在属性)，它出现在连接用户界面的顶部。The instruction title text is just below the header text (contained in the property), which is found at the top of the connection UI. 说明标题是会通知用户可以使用者或提供程序上执行的操作类型的一般描述参与现有连接控件。The instruction title is a general description that informs users what type of action can be performed on the consumer or provider control that is participating in an existing connection. 默认情况下的说明标题开头**管理的连接**，并且用户选择通过单击其谓词菜单的连接谓词的使用者或提供程序控件的名称结尾。By default, the instruction title begins with **Manage the connections for**, and ends with the name of the consumer or provider control that the user selected by clicking the connect verb on its verbs menu. > [!NOTE] > 当将自定义的值分配给此属性时，请记住，您无法知道在设计时用户将选择要管理的连接，因此自定义指令标题必须很通用，以引用使用者或 pr 的提供程序或使用者控件是否ovider 控件。When you assign a custom value to this property, remember that you cannot know at design time whether the user will select a provider or consumer control on which to manage the connection, so the custom instruction title must be general enough to refer to a consumer or a provider control. 与此相反，属性的默认值是此类的方式呈现它动态地将追加用户选择任何使用者或提供程序控件的名称。In contrast, the default value of the property is rendered in such a way that it dynamically appends the name of whatever consumer or provider control that the user selects. 如果你想要提供的属性，以模拟此行为的自定义值，则必须从类，并重写此属性或方法。If you want to supply a custom value for the property that mimics this behavior, you must inherit from the class, and override this property or the method. 可以设置此属性以声明方式中的开始标记的值``元素中的，通过添加一个名为属性`InstructionTitle`并将其分配一个值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `InstructionTitle` and assigning it a value. 此外可以以编程方式设置的属性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将具有属性控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 该示例包含仅说明如何使用属性; Web 页的代码其他两个代码运行该示例，请参阅示例部分的所需文件类概述。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于在网页上切换显示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 获取此代码从类概述。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含的代码的邮政编码接口和两个源文件控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 获取此代码从类概述。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件的网页声明``元素，并演示如何以编程方式使用该属性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. Web 页面声明``元素，然后在`Page_PreRender`方法，该代码将一个值赋给属性。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器页面加载。Load the page in a browser. 切换到连接模式，使用**显示模式**控件。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击谓词菜单箭头**ZIP Code 使用者**控件，并单击连接谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb. 在视图中打开的现有连接，请注意，正下方的标题文本中，连接区域中，顶部附近的说明标题是分配给的值代码示例中的属性。In the view that opens for the existing connection, note that the instruction title just below the header text, near the top of the connections zone, is the value assigned to the property in the code example.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构并不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 调用此方法时，它确定是否视图状态以前保存的控件，是否是这样，将视图状态设置为保存的值。When this method is invoked, it determines whether view state was previously saved for the control and, if so, sets the view state to the saved value. 该方法重写方法继承自类，以便它可以将添加到基实现并还原状态中使用的多个区域级动词控件。The method overrides the method inherited from the class, so that it can add to the base implementation and restore state for the several zone-level verbs used in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将引发事件并为其提供自定义处理程序。This method raises the event and provides a custom handler for it. 网页进入或退出连接显示模式后，此方法将执行唯一的几个步骤控件。After a Web page enters or exits the connect display mode, this method carries out several steps unique to the control. 方法取消此时处于挂起状态，可确保通过设置显示在连接用户界面 (UI) 中的没有子控件的任何连接活动属性设置为`false`，并设置连接用户界面中的 it 模式如果用户执行与创建连接的过程，可以显示有关现有连接的信息。The method cancels any connection activity that is pending at this point, ensures that no child controls from the connection user interface (UI) are displayed by setting the property to `false`, and sets the connection UI to a mode in which it can display information about existing connections, if a user proceeds with the process of creating a connection. 若要将专用的处理添加到提供的处理中方法，开发人员可以继承类并重写此方法。To add specialized handling to the handling provided in the method, developers can inherit from the class and override this method. 作为替代方法，开发人员还可以提供的处理程序上的事件通过添加控件`OnDisplayModeChanged`属性为``网页，并向它分配一个自定义方法来处理该事件的值中的元素。As an alternative, developers can also provide a handler for the event on the control by adding an `OnDisplayModeChanged` attribute to the `` element in a Web page, and assigning to it the value of a custom method to handle the event. 在这种方法，开发人员可以检查的当前值属性，如果它是，它们可以执行所需的更改到控件。In this method, developers can check the current value of the property, and if it is , they can carry out the desired changes to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写实现重置连接用户界面 (UI) 的子控件将需要重新创建这一事实。This method overrides the implementation to reset the connection user interface (UI) for the fact that the child controls will have to be recreated. 这是必需的因为选定的控件更改时，UI 将发生更改，在连接中的多个选项取决于所选的控件是否使用者或提供程序，哪些连接点在控件具有 （连接点所示下拉列表控件），以及其他详细信息。This is necessary because, when the selected control changes, several options in the connection UI will change, depending on whether the selected control is a consumer or provider, what connection points the controls has (the connection points are listed in drop-down list controls), and other details.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在特定的连接方案中才会生效。The property takes effect in a specific connection scenario. 当用户单击连接谓词的使用者控件，并且连接已存在，控件显示一个视图，使用户可以断开连接。When a user clicks the connect verb on a consumer control, and a connection already exists, the control displays a view that enables users to disconnect the connection. 该视图还显示参与连接的任何提供程序。The view also shows any providers participating in the connection. 提供程序的列表的正上方是说明的提供者说明文本，它默认情况下是说明的多个提供程序控件执行操作在连接中。Just above the list of providers is the providers instruction text, which by default is more of a description of what provider controls do in a connection. 可以设置此属性以声明方式中的开始标记的值``元素中的，通过添加一个名为属性`ProvidersInstructionText`并将其分配一个值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `ProvidersInstructionText` and assigning it a value. 此外可以以编程方式设置的属性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将具有属性控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 该示例包含仅说明如何使用属性; Web 页的代码其他两个代码运行该示例，请参阅示例部分的所需文件类概述。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于在网页上切换显示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 获取此代码从类概述。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含的代码的邮政编码接口和两个源文件控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 获取此代码从类概述。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件的网页声明``元素，并演示如何以编程方式使用该属性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. Web 页面声明``元素，然后在`Page_PreRender`方法，该代码将一个值赋给属性。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器页面加载。Load the page in a browser. 切换到连接模式，使用**显示模式**控件。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击谓词菜单箭头**ZIP Code 使用者**控件，并单击连接谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb. 在打开的现有连接的视图，在分配给的自定义文本的提供者部分中查找属性。In the view that opens for the existing connection, look in the providers section for the custom text assigned to the property.

summary.span: 当包含 控件的窗体回发到服务器时引发该控件的事件。

span.span: Raises an event for the control when the form that contains it posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将处理窗体包含时可能发生的几个可能结果控件回发到服务器。The method handles the several possible outcomes that can occur when a form containing a control is posted back to the server. 首先，如果的值属性是`null`，则无需再与连接相关的操作执行，因此取消任何挂起的连接，该方法返回。First, if the value of the property is `null`, there is no further connections-related action to take, so any pending connections are canceled and the method returns. 其次，如果连接用户界面 (UI) 是实际可见，并且用户是创建一个连接的过程中，该方法将处理可能的方案： 用户已单击连接谓词，用户单击断开连接的谓词，正在 UI 转换器显示，正在关闭该区域、 正在创建提供程序的连接，或正在创建连接到使用者。Second, if the connection user interface (UI) is actually visible and the user is in the process of creating a connection, the method handles the possible scenarios: the user clicked a connect verb, the user clicked a disconnect verb, the transformer UI is being displayed, the zone is being closed, a connection to a provider is being created, or a connection to a consumer is being created. 每种情况下，方法采用`eventArgument`参数传递和更新相应地进行控制。In each case, the method takes the `eventArgument` parameter being passed and updates the control accordingly. 最后，如果应用没有任何上述情况下，该方法调用基方法类。Finally, if none of the above cases apply, the method calls the base method in the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件的主体是其页眉和页脚区域之间的部分。The body of a Web Parts control is the portion between its header and footer areas. 方法重写由基完成的正文区呈现方法。The method overrides the rendering of the body region that is done by the base method. 此方法将添加到呈现唯一样式属性应用于的基控件使用，而且还会呈现适当内容的子基于以前选择的 UI 中的用户在连接用户界面 (UI) 中的控件。This method adds to the base rendering unique style attributes that apply to a control, and it also renders the appropriate content for the child controls in the connection user interface (UI), based on previous selections made by a user in the UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户将网页切换到连接显示模式，并单击的谓词菜单上的连接谓词连接、 连接用户界面 (UI) 将打开，以及控制启用的控件现在引用的属性。When a user switches a Web page into connect display mode, and clicks the connect verb on the verbs menu of a control that is enabled for connections, the connection user interface (UI) opens, and the control is now referenced by the property. > [!NOTE] > 所引用的控件属性获取其值从属性与当前对象。The control referenced by the property gets its value from the property of the current object.
